pullseq
=======

# Available modules


The overview below shows which pullseq installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using pullseq, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load pullseq/1.0.2-GCCcore-11.2.0
```
